06E82470.Line33.13C54D: I begged Lyruk to destroy it, but he refused to listen. If anyone knows more about that... thing... it's him. He's camping out in the Crown of Fiends.

3667739F.VoiceDir35.13C54D: Terrified. Someone has brought a cursed object you thought lost back to you

400B85FF.Line5.13C54D: My brother, Lyruk, heâ€™s an archaeologist. He found that cursed thing on a dig. He said that it whispered to him... told him it would grant him any wish.

DF6BCE32.Line35.13C54D: Spirits save me, it can't be!
